TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent

summary.span: 提供与 Web 应用程序视图状态相关的失败的信息。

span.span: Provides Web-application view-state-related-failure information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，可以管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含有助于管理运行状况事件的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. ASP.NET 将引发类型的事件发生视图状态失败时。ASP.NET raises events of type when a view-state failure occurs. 此失败指示尝试篡改视图状态或使用其他密钥的另一台计算机中重用。This failure indicates either an attempt to tamper with view state or its reuse from another machine with a different key. 相关的审核事件代码是。The related audit event code is . > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下你将能够实现时，使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，你将通过指定中的值来控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. ## Examples 下面是演示如何配置的配置文件的摘录捕获视图状态失败。The following is an excerpt of a configuration file showing how to configure the to capture view-state failures. 出于完整性的考虑，我们将演示的安装程序`provider`和`eventMappings`部分。For completeness we are showing the setup for the `provider` and `eventMappings` sections. 默认情况下已设置它们。They are already set by default. 需要执行的唯一操作是提供的安装程序`rules`部分。The only thing you need to do is to provide the setup for the `rules` section. 有关详细信息，请参阅`healthMonitoring`。Refer to `healthMonitoring` for more information. 若要生成的视图状态错误，请使用以下查询字符串在浏览器中输入 URL:To generate a view-state error, enter a URL in your browser with the following query string: ``` ?__VIEWSTATEFIELDCOUNT=1&__VIEWSTATE=bogus ``` Windows 应用程序事件日志将捕获视图状态故障时，如果输入的以下配置设置。The Windows Application Eventlog will capture a view-state failure, if you enter the following configuration settings. ``` // Configure the provider to process // the health events. // Configure the WebFailureAuditEvent // object to handle the Viewstate failures. // Configure the connection between the // application lifetime event object // and the provider that must process it. ```

related.span: ASP.NET 运行状况监视概述

span.span: ASP.NET Health Monitoring Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统在内部使用此构造函数。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您不应使用它来实例化对象，但实现您自己的从此类继承的事件类型时，可以调用此构造函数。You will never use it to instantiate a object, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class.
